overview:
Fazla rabby working as Managing director of Arena Phone BD.

Fazla Rabby completed Msc. in computer science. He worked in Daffodil web and ecommerce Ltd (sister concern of Daffodil group) for five years as technical manager. Latter in 2003 he joined workstation information technology, one of first Value added service provider for mobile operator as technical director. After leaving Workstation he worked on DNS software (sister concern of DNS group) as consultant for mobile vas service development and leading the development of various sms and wap related service from scratch. In 2007 he joined Arena phone Bangladesh and build the Bangladesh operation from scratch. Arena Phone currently one of largest mobile content and solution provider in Bangladesh. He has more than 12 years experience in mobile value added service, Web development, social marketing.
